text: Amity may refer to: ==Places== ===United States=== * Eagar, Arizona, a town, formerly named Amity * Amity, Arkansas, a city * Amity (New Haven), Connecticut, an area partly in Woodbridge and partly in New Haven * Amity, Georgia, an unincorporated community * Amity, Indiana, an unincorporated community * Amity, Maine, a town * Amity, Missouri, a village * Amity, New York, a town * Amity, Orange County, New York, a hamlet * Amity, Montgomery County, Ohio, an unincorporated community * Amity, Knox County, Ohio, an unincorporated community * Amity, Madison County, Ohio, an unincorporated community * Amity, Oregon, a city * Amity Hills, Oregon, range of hills northeast of Amity * Amity, Pennsylvania, an unincorporated community in Berks County * Amity, Bucks County, Pennsylvania, an unincorporated community * Amity Township (disambiguation) ===Australia=== * Amity, Queensland, a town on North Stradbroke Island, Redland City ==Schools== * Amity University (disambiguation), several universities in India * Amity College * Amity Business School, a private business school in India * Amity High School (disambiguation), several schools * Amity International School, in New Delhi, India * Amity School, in Lincolnton, Georgia * Amity International School, Erasmia, South Africa, a private school for students from grade R to 12 * Brooklyn Amity School, Brooklyn, New York, a private school for students from kindergarten to grade 12 * AEON-Amity, a chain of private English schools in Japan ==Other uses== * Amity (given name), a list of people with the name * Amity, a fictional town that is the setting of Jaws (novel), Jaws (film), Jaws 2 and Jaws: The Revenge * Amity (brig), a ship used in Australia in the early nineteenth century * Amity (1801 ship), a merchant ship, Royal Navy sloop and whaler * Amity Foundation, a charity in China * Amity, New Farm, a heritage- listed house in Brisbane, Queensland * Amity Street, Amherst, Massachusetts * Amity, one of the five factions in the Divergent series == See also == * Amityville (disambiguation)
title: Amity
